title: Bacon and sausage quiche
ingredients: ['3 slices bacon', '2 pork or beef sausages', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '280g (10oz) plain flour', '140g (5oz) margarine or butter', '3 tablespoons water', '2 eggs', '225ml (8 fl oz) double cream', '60ml (2 fl oz) full fat milk', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch ground black pepper']
